Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns

Class MaterialUISelect

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.Element
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns.SelectElement
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns.Dropdown
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns.JSDropdownElement
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.dropdowns.MaterialUISelect
public class MaterialUISelect
extends JSDropdownElement
Implementation of an Material-UI Select.
See Also:
Material-UI Select

Page Object Examples:

  • public MaterialUISelect city_dropdown() { return new MaterialUISelect(XPATH, "//p-dropdown[1]"); }
  • public MaterialUISelect state_dropdown() { return new MaterialUISelect(ID, "state"); }
  • public MaterialUISelect airport_dropdown() { return new MaterialUISelect(NAME, "airport"); }

  • Constructor Details

    • MaterialUISelect

      public MaterialUISelect​(java.lang.String elementName, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> selectors)
      Implementation of a JSDropdownElement to initialize how an element is going to be found when it is worked on by the WebDriver class. Takes a reference to the WebDriver class that will be exercising its functionality.
      Parameters:
      elementName - String the name of the element
      selectors - Map<String,String> the list of selectors to use to find the element

  • Method Details

    • getOption

      Returns a WebElement for an option with the given text.
      Specified by:
      getOption in class JSDropdownElement
      Parameters:
      selectionText - String the text to be selected
      Returns:
      WebElement the element representing the option

    • getOption

      protected org.openqa.selenium.WebElement getOption​(int index)
      Returns a WebElement for an option with the given index.
      Specified by:
      getOption in class JSDropdownElement
      Parameters:
      index - int the index of the option, starting with 1
      Returns:
      WebElement the element representing the option
